text: Jenelle Evans isn't wasting any time with her oldest child, Jace, now that she's reached a custody agreement with her mother. The MTV mom pulled out all the stops on her most recent visit with the 7 - year - old, including a beach vacation with horseback riding. Blessed this day finally got to happen. Brought Jace to the place I've been wanting to for years. I'm so grateful and blessed my son can travel now and share the same experiences... starting now. by @ easondavid88 A post shared by Jenelle Evans ( @ j _ evans1219 ) on Jun 9, 2017 at 7 : 31am PDT Evans and her son were apart for five weeks earlier this year, but at the end of May, she's
